text: @GovernorKayIvey You and the state are going to have many deaths from Covid19. Have fun with your backwards medical situation. Your hospitals are already at full capacity in ICUs. Now you can't even help new severe cases of Covid19. You will be charged with murder for mental health Covid19 deaths
